sentences.sContent: shows aimed at large undifferentiated groups of people
sentences.sCn: 针对不加以细分的大众的节目

sentences.sContent: Colonial officials tended to see Indian society as an undifferentiated whole.
sentences.sCn: 殖民地官员往往把印度社会看成一个统一整体。

trans.tranOther: something which is undifferentiated is not split into parts, or has different parts but you cannot tell the difference between them
